title: Package Lockers, Versatile Track Lighting Systems
posting_body: Pricing is all dependent on move-in date and lease length; we offer 3-13-month term options.
Our website will show all rates and terms updated each day.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 545-634 Sq.
Our on-site leasing team is here to help you with all of life's little details including dry cleaning, transportation, dog walking and grocery delivery.
Wallingford is a neighborhood close to downtown where you can enjoy all the conveniences city living has to offer.
An easy walk to Fremont, Gas Works Park, Fremont Troll and The Sunday Fremont Market; Wallingford is a true cultural destination that all must come an explore.

Decks, patios, or private rooftop terraces*, Controlled Access Doors, Vaulted Ceilings*, Walk-in Closets*, Vinyl Floors*, Full-Size In-Unit Washer and Dryer, Versatile Track Lighting Systems, Stainless Steel Appliances, 17-Foot Ceilings*

FOB Access Doors, Night Patrol, On-Site Bike Storage, Roof -Top w/ Spectacular Views, Easy Access to I-5, 99 & Bus Route 62/26, Pea Patch Garden Bins, 3 On-Site BBQ Grills, Conference Room w/ Wi-fi, Gated Access Parking Garage, Package Lockers, Lease Terms from 3-13 months, Fitness center, Community Lounge w/ Wi-fi, Off-Leash Dog Run, On-Site Storage Units
Our apartments accommodate up to two pets per home.
Additional deposits and breed restrictions apply.
Income must be 3 times the amount of rent to qualify.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
